name: Hoppe ni Himawari
nutshell:
1-3: Hoppe ni Himawari
A story about a cute chubby guy in the gardening club who admires his classmate, the baseball team captain.
4-8: Fukai Mori
A story about a part-time cellist player at a bar reuniting with his uncle, a freelance designer.

name: Daten Sakusen
nutshell:
A story of a immortal man, Under, who is stranded in the middle of a grand war between humans and demons. Under cannot remember where he came from or what he really is, and despite being an undying immortal that can regenerate himself over and over no matter what happens, he lives his like a corpse, with no purpose or desire.
That all changed when he got captured by the Demon army and was put on the “Space Execution” with Recobell, where the two were locked up on an hot air balloon and sent up the atmosphere to die. Through his conversations with Recobell, Under slowly develops motivations to live, and seeks to find the meaning of this seemingly endless and pointless war between the two factions.
(Source: ruggia's (raw) manga rants)

name: Saikai no Chi Dekiai - Futatabime no Ai wo Kizamitsukete
nutshell:
Cover Illustrator: SUZUKURA Haru
Content list:

MINAMI Haruko "Onzoushi wa Koiwazurai na Hunter"
Okeido "Kawaii Kouhai no Kawaikunai Kudokikata"
SAKURAI Asuka "Natsu, Kimi ni Mata Koishiteru"
AYANO Taka "Osananajimi wa Dekiai Ookami Ryouteippai no Ai de Otosaremashita"
Kigna Stelco "Motokare to, Saikai 0-nichi Konshichaimashita!?"
Shirizaki "Toshishita Wankono Sakuryakuteki Romance"

name: Copernicus tenkitenkai no Seishun-teki ôyô
nutshell: Itsuki, is a girl a bit strange, although she looks like a normal girl, apart from her appearance is hidden a true lover of cinema, especially classic and old movies. This hobby leads her to meet one of the most beautiful boys in the school, Shima, who loves cinema just like her.

name: Touhou - Eternity Meal, One Portion (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Mokou just finished a good meal prepared by Kaguya. Now she wants a more "delicious" meal.

name: Ever Share Color
nutshell: Having just started high school, Riku's set on making this an experience he'll never forget. He notices though, that for Wakamura, a quiet girl who is always listening to the radio during the breaks, her idea of a high school experience is a bit different. Can he open up her heart and make her realize there's more to life than spending her time alone?

name: The Devil's Domineering Love
nutshell: She was deceived into entering the wealthy devil's den. Her days of misery begun as she lost her freedom and was forced to be the personal maid of the devilish president. Struggling through the days in a luxurious manor where evil lurked in every corner, she gathered her wits and courage as she tried her best to stick up for herself. For the sake of her family and the boy she liked, she had to swallow her anger and tolerate the ingenious tortures of the devilish president. She was extremely careful and cautious, but no matter what she did, there was no escaping him. She did not understand why a complete stranger like him would treat her this way. She was after all, just a simple girl who minded her own business.

name: Tit For Tat
nutshell: On the very first day he gets promoted, Gu Qingpei gets thrown the Chairman's son, who he was unable to raise well. Huh? He was supposed to 'babysit'? This irritable, overbearing army ruffian was always dramatically opposed to him. If he, Gu Qingpei, was unable to deal with this rough brat, how could he persuade the employees in his company? The days pass in anxiety with the open strife between the two. It's just that their relationship was developing in the opposite of what one would expect...

name: Menhera-chan
nutshell:
"I want to have a smile on me when I talk to you today."
Menhera-chan is a pessimistic girl.
Byoujaku-chan is a frail girl with a wild imagination and a love for BL.
Kenkou-kun is a normal boy, in body and mind.
This is the story of their dark and heartwarming daily life.

name: Donten ni Sirius
nutshell:
Due to the nature of her father's job, Hinoka has transferred schools several times. When her friends from her first school ceased contact after her transfer, Hinoka resolved never to become close to anyone again. Now in her seventh transfer school, she joins the idle astronomy club, thinking she could continue living her life alone. But what happens when she meets a boy who shines like the brightest star, Sirius, on a cloudy day?
Included one-shots: Bousou Otome★Muu, Suppinpin!

name: Medyuusa no Musuko
nutshell: Etruria, un pequeño país europeo en el siglo XIX. En una brigada en un área remota rodeada de nieve, dos hombres aristócratas trabajaban como personal militar, mezclados con hombres toscos que acababan de tener una razón para ser enviados a las áreas remotas. Julius, que tiene cejas hermosas y es la piedra angular de la brigada, y Robin, que nació en una familia muy conocida desde la antigüedad, a quien jura lealtad. A pesar de ser el capitán de esta brigada, Robin era egoísta y débil, como si fuera un niño. Aún así, Julius, quien ha estado con Robin durante muchos años como cuidador y estuvo a su lado más que nadie como un buen amigo. Sin embargo, los ojos de Robin que miraban fijamente a Julius tenían un calor diferente. ¡Chico obsesivo x chico sincero! ¡La única y pesada fantasía oscura BL, comienza!

name: Chichi no nakushi mono
nutshell:
大好きで、大嫌いだった亡き父を想うエッセイコミック。
かつては海ほど大きく感じた父親は、どうしようもないさみしさを抱えた、ひとりのちいさな男だった。
家族、故郷、仕事、若さ、記憶、感情……手の平から少しずつ零れ落ちていくように、大切なものをなくしていく父。
その人生と、別れを描いたエッセイコミック。

name: Kechonpa
nutshell: Ririko, a stylish Charisma Gal from Shibuya, finds herself playing amateur detective after an unexpected turn of events. She is keen to solve cases to prove herself worthy of elite police detective Nii, a man she adores and regards as her fiance. But her enthusiasm leads her into a whole lot of trouble.

name: Girls Who Wanted to Be Chosen
nutshell:
The adolescence of girls around a single boy.
This is the story after.

name: Too Long
nutshell:
From Hee Jung Park comes ten stories of love, sadness, longing and alienation. A young man finds himself continuously drawn into the orbit of future suicide victims, while another finds redemption in an unlikely ally. And an apathetic lover can only enliven his pallid relationship with the crimson color of blood…

Blood
So Long…
Crazy Guy
Feel So Good
Insomnia
Ember
Kwanglim is Amazing
Music Box
Ul Heul Lee
Crybaby Angel

name: Shingeki no Kyojin - Holy Dream (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Erwin Smith x Levi Ackerman

name: The Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild - I'll Protect You!
nutshell:
Artist’s Pixiv
Artist's FANBOX: https://www.pixiv.net/fanbox/creator/16283435

name: Monster in the Greenhouse (Promo)
nutshell:
The man I trusted cheated on me with my maid.
Julia Lappier, the so-called flower of society and envied by everyone.
She had a lover for 10 years, and he was the illegitimate son of a baron who had nothing.
For him, Julia gives everything she has, making her a greenhouse, but…
"Julia is a girl who has nothing but a pretty face and a family."
"But she is the only child of the Marquis."
"Let's see. I'll make you the hostess of the Marquis, if I just marry that bitch."
For him, Julia was nothing more than a valuable tool with benefits of use.
Upon realizing all the truth, Julia decides to take revenge and separates herself if her hidden life, and finds herself…
The truth hidden in the splendor, the story of a monster that blooms in the greenhouse.

name: Cinderella Boy
nutshell:
One of the five handsome men in the incredibly popular idol group "Z", Riku, is actually a girl! She's tied with the leader, Touya, for popularity. She pretends to be the type of guy that makes all the girls smile and is extremely cool-looking. However, when she receives a Christmas present from Touya, she decides she wants to show him her feminine side…!?
Includes a short story called Romantic Shiyo! (Let's Be Romantic!).

name: Aikata no Aishikata
nutshell: Another scandal is to take place at Toudou Group, the unknown spy appears! The romance of a part-time worker. Saiki Jun and Jin Kyoutaro story.

name: 13th Boy
nutshell: It was love at first sight. The moment Hee-So's eyes met Won-Jun’s she knew it was meant to be. Their relationship took off when Hee-So confessed her feelings on national TV, but less than a month later, Won-jun is ready to call it quits without any explanation at all. Hee-So’s had a lot of boyfriends — Won-Jun is number twelve — but being dumped is never easy. She’s not ready to move on to the thirteenth boy just yet. Determined to reunite with Won-Jun, Hee-So’s on a mission to win over her destined love once more.

name: JK to Josou Oji-san
nutshell:
化粧が好きで、メイクの仕方などをSNSにUPしていた女子高生・結城花凛は、ある日SNS経由で「くるみ」という人物からメイクの指南をお願いされる。
悩みながらも、謝礼に惹かれ、くるみの住むマンションへとやってきた花凛だったが、そこにいたのは、久留見猛という女装趣味のおっさん（大企業勤務のアラフォー）だった……おじさんのインパクト絶大！ JKと女装おじさんのツッコミ必至コメディ大反響につき連載化！

name: Severed Head
nutshell: The journey of a pair of siblings, Danyoung and Danri who is out to seek revenge against the arch nemesis of their parents.

name: Kono Otoko o Ore ni Kudasai
nutshell: Shishiuchi es un joven trabajador de la compañ� a Cocoe, una agencia matrimonial, que se especializa en eventos como "Citas a ciegas" en la cual también intentara ayudar a su nuevo cliente Wataru a conseguir pareja mediante estas.

name: Eden no Majotachi
nutshell: ||The country ruled by witches, Eden. In a remote village by the border, the barrier witch Belno and her people rejoice in their difficult but happy daily lives. However, suddenly the fog barrier is broken, and they're attacked by a beast. With the power of the border witch Rina, and the demon Haures, they are able to repel the attack, but this is just the beginning of everything. The war of science and demons, that will dye the utopia with blood and gunpowder. A fight to reveal the truth of the cruel world. Thus the curtain opens on a shocking dark fantasy!!||

name: FUTURE STAY ROUTE - Guardiantales
nutshell:
A fancomic of the game guardiantales.
an Alternate route,
telling the story of what if Knight stayed with the future-princess in future, and there lives through out those 10 years and more.

name: Lost - Shissou Shatachi
nutshell:
After losing everything and running away, there is a free mahjong parlor in the crowds of Shinjuku.
I have 0 yen to my name, Still I chose to live.
This is a battlefield.
And in a battlefield… it's kill or be killed.

name: Isn't the Contrast Cute?
tags: Long Strip,Romance,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell:
It's all about contrast here!
The most handsome boy at school, who seems cold and arrogant, is actually afraid of talking to girls! The gentle and talented top student is really the cold-blooded prince of a gang! The carefree and unkept girl, is, in fact, a young lady from a billionaire family! The sharp and sexy senior is a girl who can’t resist cute things! Their so-called ‘super stern’ teacher is, in reality, a fujoshi who ships her own students!
Jiang Zhiling just wanted to find a part-time job and make some pocket money to support her father’s pursuit of invention. By accident, she discovered who all these people really were underneath their masks. Soon, she began to think she was attending a school filled with fakers!

name: Hooves of Death
nutshell:
It’s the end of the world, and humanity is on its last legs against the zombie horde. Now, all that stands between mankind and total extinction are Commander Sprinkles, Blaze, Sergeant Glitter and a handful of other fierce warriors. Mythical creatures with supernatural powers and incredible determination, they have sworn to protect the human race. Yes, they are unicorns – but they are also our last hope.
RUS: || Мир охватил зомби-апокалипсис и человечеству грозит полное вымирание. И только одно отделяет людей от полного исчезновения - единороги. Мифические существа со сверхъестественными способностями и невероятной решимостью, что поклялись защищать человеческую расу. Командир Спринклс, Блейз, Сержант Глиттер и другие отважные воины готовы к спасению мира! Ведь они - наша последняя надежда…||

name: Katakoi Opera
nutshell: Akuta falls in love easily and almost without fail. His childhood friend, Ao, has been crushing on him for ten years. Always protecting Akuta, Ao destroys any hope of Akuta's unrequited love reciprocating his feelings, as Akuta always returns to Ao's side when he is heartbroken. Ao, who has been thinking "I have to make him realize these intense feelings and this painful desire," will eventually…?

name: Haruiro Stalker
nutshell: Ao Momose has a stalker who's ruining his love life, but instead of chasing the stalker off, he asks her out on a date so he can dispel her delusions about him.

name: A Slave Who Wants to Do Perverted Things With Her Master
nutshell: Short gag comedy manga about a slave who wants to do perverted things with her master.
